Reviews.Title: its not the DVD 104 I ordered
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: the DVU 105 is a far cry from the DVU 104...  less useful options and in my opion should be in the 5 doller useless kunker department .... but if you look up a 104 you get this hunk of junk as the new and improved 194... its not!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This item is definitely NOT what I thought or was led to believe it was. From the description, I thought it was the camera but it really is only the link from 4 cameras to a computer - NOT what I wanted. Now I have to figure out how to return it & get my money back.

ProductInfo.Features:
Fast MPEG4 video compression
Schedule mode, record by motion, and auto recycling
4 camera input channel USB 2.0
Remote view, support IE web brower
Remote surveillance and PTZ control through web browser
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 CH USB 2.0 DVR PC Digital Audio Video Security Camera Surveillance Recorder 1OZ
